HzStream

A struct to store a buffer.  This is also used by <HzDeserializer> to read off bytes.

See Also

<HzDeserializer>

hz_stream_create
HZ_STATIC HzStream hz_stream_create(
const uint8_t *data,
size_t size
)

Creates a byte stream, holds data and a bump pointer allowing seeking, unpacking various primitives from memory.

Parameters
data
const uint8_t*

The pointer to the memory.

size
size_t

The size of the block (If this is 0, then there's no bound check).

Returns

A <hz_stream_t> instance.
